name: yet-another-set
body:
# yet-another-set

Let's implement yet another version of set, but learn new tools while doing this.  I think entire implementation will end up being in javascript.  Hopefully, a lot of these are tools we have probably heard (since popular organizations like NY Times, Facebook, etc have created/utilized them) of but haven't worked a lot with.

* node.js backend
* react.js for views? or full backbone.js framework
* socket.io
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
